dialogText: It is not a good idea to get carried away by a place like this, Theodore. It might be treacherous, you know... I say that from experience...
I wonder how you can be so well centred in this situation, Jonas. Isn't your catventurous blood boiling by this point?
Curiosity killed the cat, remember? Being well centred in these situations is exactly how I kept my head attached to my body for so long. An Archeologist should never get so distracted.
I guess that's what makes you the best of the best in that profession. You did make a name for yourself in that era.
I sure did, pal!! Now, let's go find some ancient artifacts!!!
Please, Jonas... Do not forget your mission here...
If we have some time, we will deal with that...
Do you I need to remind you of the cat-astrophies that leaving the dog be would create???
Fiiiiiinneeeee... I will go find that dog for you, Theodore...
